title: ISic001687. I.Sicily inscription 001687
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΗΡ..····[---]

Apparatus criticus

  • text from photograph

translation

commentary

Although published by Gabrici and Vento, there were no visible traces of text; some traces are now visible due to recent conservation work.

bibliography

  • Gabrici 1929 56, plate IV.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001976
  • Vento 2000 66-68 tav. 20-24 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001525
